skills.name: Stun and Run
skills.description: [SP: 14][CD: 16s] Drops a stun bomb and teleports backwards. The stun bomb then explodes, dealing 350% ATK of Physical DMG and generating a stun field that lasts for 4.50s.

skills.name: Temporal Frenzy
skills.description: When triggering global Time Fracture, character gains 80.0% Attack Speed and 25.0% Crit Rate for 4s. Said buffs are dispelled once Time Fracture ends.
